extendedInfo.description: **Awarded third "Best Artistic App of 2011" on BestAppEver.com**Draw(er) is a sketching/drawing app, with a twist. The various tools give you a new perspective on drawing. So your basic lines, turn into works of art!Features:â¢ Set Canvas Colorâ¢ Set Brush Sizeâ¢ Undo/Redoâ¢ Color Slidersâ¢ Save+Share Sketchâ¢ Drawing Tools  -Eraser  -Fur  -Long Fur  -Simple  -Sketchy  -Squares  -Circles  -WebBuying this app will help me to continue adding new features! If your not quite ready to buy it, try regular Draw(er), it's FREE!Original idea and drawing algorithms from mrdoob.comSEO: draw, drawing, paint, painting, sketch, sketching, art, drawer, creative, procedural

reviews.comment: Im having lots of problems with this app have to go to market to use pro after purchase it refuses to send drawing to google plus but I wont give up.y

reviews.title: Neat app
reviews.comment: dig the new updates. Really nice app!!

reviews.title: Refund please. No colours
reviews.comment: Bought this last night and not happy with it. Can\'t change colours . Please refund me .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best drawing app. Love the cool and unique features. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the updates, the pro version is worth it! The different colored canvases and undo/redo features are my favorite things.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great generative drawing app with a lot of promise. I hope the developer keeps going with it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No big difference bw this and free one. Waste $1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the updates! Being able can choose canvas colors and brush sizes rocks, and now I can find my files much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Innovative! It would be cool to have more brushes. But it\'s a great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: There is no exit button. Had to turn off to exit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app but lags when used on a tablet and no way to exit program. There is also a doubling affect when filling in space as in shadows.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very easy to use...
reviews.comment: I do not recommend buying this app. I never got a refund. I suggest Sketchpad for $5 if you really want something worth while. I just wish I could have a simple drawing app without all the advanced tools and excessive fake stuff: sometimes I just need to draw a quick symbol to convey a message... like when speech isn\'t an option.
reviews.author: Josh Ashmore

reviews.comment: disappointed with the pro version, all I wanted was higher resolution!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, elegant, honest
reviews.comment: I bought the pro version to show my gratitude for the excellent ad-free free version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Worst app ever better waist your time and money on something else.
reviews.author: Joseph Gonzalez
